page.title: 08Alderney Airport I
page.content: The major airline using Alderney Airport is Aurigny Air Services(Aurigny is the French name for Alderney).A.A.S has seven arrivals and departures daily in winter and seventeen in summer.The destinations are Guernsey,Jersey,Southampton,Bournemou th and Cherbourg.A.A.S has seven Britten-Norman Trislanders and two Islanders.75,000 passengers are carried each year and there are about 30 ambulance charters.A.A.S employ 23 pilots.In total 85 people work as pilots,sales,booking,operations,accoun ts and engineering. The airport fire service has two engines and eleven firemen.The fire service practice daily and deal with a trial fire weekly.There are two customs men who look for drugs,plants,uncooked meats and drink.
